caption.p: PCR conformations of transgenic hairy roots (A 4 and R 1000) from A. vulgaris L. leaf explants. (A) rolB gene amplification (780 bp). (B) rolC gene amplification (540 bp). Lane M: marker, lane 1: A 4 plasmid DNA, lane 2: R 1000 plasmid DNA, lanes 3 and 4: genomic DNA of hairy root culture (A 4 strain), lanes 5 and 6: genomic DNA of hairy root culture (R 1000 strain), Nt: non-transgenic root.
